name: wilds_of_eldraine
description: Huge package capturing Wilds of Eldraine mechanics: Roles, Bargain, Adventure, Celebration, Food/Faerie support, Auras/Equipment.

Instant: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Exile target tapped creature. If this spell was bargained, you gain {X} life.
Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn. Create a Royal Role token attached to it. (Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.)
Destroy target enchantment. Celebration — Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Celebration — Draw a card for each permanent that entered the battlefield under your control this turn.
